edu.gatech.mbse.transformations.sysml2milp.model

Class ProcessFlattener

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.gatech.mbse.transformations.sysml2milp.model.ProcessFlattener

  • public class ProcessFlattener
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates a Process from an Eclipse UML2 Activity.

    Note that the input process should be:
    1) Acyclic
    2) Be governed by object flows (current limitation)

    Version:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Sebastian

      • toProcess

        public static Process toProcess(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Activity startingPoint)
        Generates a process form an Eclipse UML2 Activity as the starting point.
        Parameters:
        startingPoint - The starting activity.
        Returns:
        An internal process representation.

      • handleProcessBranch

        private static org.eclipse.uml2.uml.ActivityNode handleProcessBranch(Process processStep)
        Add a process step in sequence, or parallel "sub"-processes. Returns an object representing a point of joining / merging if it has been reached.
        Parameters:
        processStep - The particular process step to handle.
        Returns:
        The next action or a join or fork node.

      • findNextActions

        private static java.util.ArrayList<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.ActivityNode> findNextActions(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.NamedElement sourceNode)
        Find the next activity / activities to be executed based on a starting activity node.
        Parameters:
        sourceNode - The source node to start from.
        Returns:
        The next action, determined by following object flows.

      • findSubProcessWithCorrespondingAction

        public static Process findSubProcessWithCorrespondingAction(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.ActivityNode actNode,
                                            Process process)
        Searches through the given process hierarchy to find a particular process step that is associated with a particular activity node.

        The function is used to search for elements that have already been visited in generating the flat hierarchy from the Activity diagram so that infinite loops when parsing can be avoided.

        Parameters:
        actNode - The activity node that the needle in the process haystack is associated with
        process - The top level process to search from
        Returns:
        null if no process found, the process that is associated with the given activity node otherwise

      • hasMultipleObjectInflows

        public static boolean hasMultipleObjectInflows(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.ActivityNode node)
        Returns true if the given node has multiple input parameters. This is used in determining merge points.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to check.
        Returns:
        true if the ActivityNode has multiple inflows.

      • hasMultipleObjectOutflows

        public static boolean hasMultipleObjectOutflows(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.ActivityNode node)
        Returns true if the given node has multiple output parameters.
        Parameters:
        node - The ActivityNode to check.
        Returns:
        true if the specified node has multiple outflows.
